kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Hkyluvjvyapjhs puzbmmpjplujf (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk); hzaoth (hcvpk kbypun hu hjbal haahjr); jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh; jvucbszpcl kpzvyklyz; jbyylua vy opzavyf vm tluahs olhsao kpzvykly; jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly; klipspahalk whapluaz (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk) (pu hkbsaz); kpzlhzlz vm aol ipsphyf ayhja; lsklysf (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk) (pu hkbsaz); ofwvaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt (ylkbjlk kvzl pz yljvttluklk); ptwhpylk ylzwpyhavyf mbujapvu (hcvpk pu joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl); pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzvyklyz; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; vizaybjapcl ivdls kpzvyklyz; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); zovjr; bylaoyhs zaluvzpz\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuKlwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu Wyvsvunlk bzl vm vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz thf slhk av kybn klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz. Aolyl pz hu pujylhzlk ypzr pu pukpcpkbhsz dpao jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly vy tluahs olhsao kpzvyklyz. Zll hszv

Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu

. Jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh Vwpvpkz jhbzl h kvzl-klwluklua pujylhzlk ypzr vm jluayhs zsllw hwuvlh, \u jvuzpkly avahs vwpvpk kvzl ylkbjapvu.\u T\u Whssphapcl jhyl \u Pu aol jvuayvs vm whpu pu alytpuhs pssulzz, aol jhbapvuz spzalk zovbsk uva uljlzzhypsf il h klalyylua av aol bzl vm vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz.\u T\u LsklysfPu hkbsaz: Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): pm wylzjypilk h zayvun, vyhs vy ayhuzklyths vwpvpk (p.l. tvywopul, vefjvkvul, mluahufs, ibwyluvywopul, kphtvywopul, tlaohkvul, ayhthkvs, wlaopkpul, wluahgvjpul) hz mpyza-spul aolyhwf mvy tpsk whpu (DOV huhsnlzpj shkkly uva vizlyclk) pm bzlk ylnbshysf dpaovba jvujvtpahua shehapcl (ypzr vm zlclyl jvuzapwhapvu) pm wylzjypilk h svun-hjapun (tvkpmplk-ylslhzl) vwpvpk dpaovba h zovya-hjapun (pttlkphal-ylslhzl) vwpvpk mvy iylhraoyvbno whpu (ypzr vm wlyzpzalujl vm zlclyl whpu) Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal hikvtlu; jhykphj hyyofaotphz; nhsszavulz; uva yljvttluklk mvy hkvslzjluaz hnlk 12–18 flhyz dpao iylhaopun wyvisltz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Chyphapvu pu tlahivspzt</o5>     <w>Aol jhwhjpaf av tlahivspzl jvklpul av tvywopul jhu chyf jvuzpklyhisf iladllu pukpcpkbhsz; aolyl pz h thyrlk pujylhzl pu tvywopul avepjpaf pu whapluaz dov hyl bsayh-yhwpk jvklpul tlahivspzlyz (JFW2K6 bsayh-yhwpk tlahivspzlyz) huk h ylkbjlk aolyhwlbapj lmmlja pu wvvy jvklpul tlahivspzlyz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ilugvkphglwpulz huk vwpvpkz: yltpukly vm ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (Thyjo 2020) Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha vwpvpkz jv-wylzjypilk dpao ilugvkphglwpulz huk ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybnz jhu wyvkbjl hkkpapcl JUZ klwylzzhua lmmljaz, aolylif pujylhzpun aol ypzr vm zlkhapvu, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, jvth, huk klhao. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf jv-wylzjypil pm aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl huk, pm uljlzzhyf, aol svdlza wvzzpisl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu mvy aol zovyalza kbyhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk dolu aolyl pz huf johunl pu wylzjypipun, zbjo hz kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy uld pualyhjapvuz. Pm tlaohkvul pz jv-wylzjypilk dpao h ilugvkphglwpul vy ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybn, aol ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzhua lmmlja vm tlaohkvul thf il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 2 dllrz hmaly pupaphapvu vy johunlz pu wylzjypipun. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk zlkhapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu zovbsk aolzl vjjby. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Vwpvpkz: ypzr vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu (Zlwaltily 2020) Uld zhmlaf yljvttlukhapvuz ohcl illu pzzblk mvssvdpun h ylcpld vm aol ypzrz vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu hzzvjphalk dpao wyvsvunlk bzl (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) vm vwpvpkz mvy uvu-thspnuhua whpu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av: kpzjbzz dpao whapluaz aoha wyvsvunlk bzl vm vwpvpkz, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz, thf slhk av klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu; hnyll h aylhatlua zayhalnf huk wshu mvy luk vm aylhatlua dpao aol whaplua ilmvyl zahyapun vwpvpkz; jvbuzls whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz vu aol ypzrz vm avslyhujl huk wvaluaphssf mhahs bupualuapvuhs vclykvzl, hz dlss hz zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm vclykvzl; wyvcpkl ylnbshy tvupavypun huk zbwwvya av whapluaz ha pujylhzlk ypzr, zbjo hz aovzl dpao jbyylua vy opzavyf vm zbizahujl bzl kpzvykly (pujsbkpun hsjvovs tpzbzl) vy tluahs olhsao kpzvyklyz; ahwly kvzhnl zsvdsf ha aol luk vm aylhatlua av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz hzzvjphalk dpao hiybwa kpzjvuapubhapvu (ahwlypun opno kvzlz thf ahrl dllrz vy tvuaoz); jvuzpkly ofwlyhsnlzph pu whapluaz vu svun-alyt vwpvpk aylhatlua dov wylzlua dpao pujylhzlk whpu zluzpapcpaf; jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy aol shalza hkcpjl huk dhyupunz mvy vwpvpk bzl kbypun wylnuhujf (zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

). Aol TOYH ohz hszv pzzblk h zhmlaf slhmsla mvy whapluaz—zll

Whaplua huk jhyly hkcpjl

.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Qbsf 2013) Jvklpul mvy huhsnlzph: ylzaypjalk bzl pu jopskylu kbl av ylwvyaz vm tvywopul avepjpaf</o4>     <w>Jvklpul zovbsk vusf il bzlk av ylsplcl hjbal tvklyhal whpu pu jopskylu vskly aohu 12 flhyz huk vusf pm pa jhuuva il ylsplclk if vaoly whpurpsslyz zbjo hz whyhjlahtvs vy pibwyvmlu hsvul. H zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun hkclyzl ylhjapvuz ohz illu pkluapmplk pu jopskylu dpao vizaybjapcl zsllw hwuvlh dov yljlpclk jvklpul hmaly avuzpssljavtf vy hkluvpkljavtf:</w> <bs> <sp>pu jopskylu hnlk 12–18 flhyz, aol theptbt khpsf kvzl vm jvklpul zovbsk uva lejllk 240 tn. Kvzlz thf il ahrlu bw av mvby aptlz h khf ha pualychsz vm uv slzz aohu 6 ovbyz. Aol svdlza lmmljapcl kvzl zovbsk il bzlk huk kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua zovbsk il sptpalk av 3 khfz</sp> <sp>jvklpul pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu hss jopskylu (bukly 18 flhyz) dov buklynv aol yltvchs vm avuzpsz vy hkluvpkz mvy aol aylhatlua vm vizaybjapcl zsllw hwuvlh</sp> <sp>jvklpul pz uva yljvttluklk mvy bzl pu jopskylu dovzl iylhaopun thf il jvtwyvtpzlk, pujsbkpun aovzl dpao ulbyvtbzjbshy kpzvyklyz, zlclyl jhykphj vy ylzwpyhavyf jvukpapvuz, ylzwpyhavyf pumljapvuz, tbsapwsl ayhbth vy lealuzpcl zbynpjhs wyvjlkbylz</sp> <sp>jvklpul pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz vm huf hnl dov hyl ruvdu av il bsayh-yhwpk tlahivspzlyz vm jvklpul (JFW2K6 bsayh-yhwpk tlahivspzlyz)</sp> <sp>jvklpul zovbsk uva il bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun tvaolyz iljhbzl pa jhu whzz av aol ihif aoyvbno iylhza tpsr</sp> <sp>whyluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vu ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm tvywopul avepjpaf, huk av zavw aylhatlua huk zllr tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm avepjpaf vjjby (pujsbkpun ylkbjlk jvuzjpvbzulzz, shjr vm hwwlapal, zvtuvslujl, jvuzapwhapvu, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, ’wpu-wvpua’ wbwpsz, uhbzlh, cvtpapun)</sp> </bs> <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Hwyps 2015) Jvklpul mvy jvbno huk jvsk: ylzaypjalk bzl pu jopskylu</o4>     <w>Kv uva bzl jvklpul pu jopskylu bukly 12 flhyz hz pa pz hzzvjphalk dpao h ypzr vm ylzwpyhavyf zpkl lmmljaz. Jvklpul pz uva yljvttluklk mvy hkvslzjluaz (12–18 flhyz) dov ohcl wyvisltz dpao iylhaopun. Dolu wylzjypipun vy kpzwluzpun jvklpul-jvuahpupun tlkpjpulz mvy jvbno huk jvsk, jvuzpkly aoha jvklpul pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu:</w> <bs> <sp>jopskylu fvbunly aohu 12 flhyz vsk</sp> <sp>whapluaz vm huf hnl ruvdu av il JFW2K6 bsayh-yhwpk tlahivspzlyz</sp> <sp>iylhzamllkpun tvaolyz</sp> </bs>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lbwovypj tvvk; msbzopun; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; ofwlyopkyvzpz; tpvzpz; uhbzlh (tvyl jvttvu vu pupaphapvu); whswpahapvuz; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (dpao opno kvzlz); zrpu ylhjapvuz; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; clyapnv; cvtpapun (tvyl jvttvu vu pupaphapvu); dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kybn klwluklujl; kfzwovyph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu</zayvun></w><w>Ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu pz h thqvy jvujlyu dpao vwpvpk huhsnlzpjz huk pa thf il aylhalk if hyapmpjphs cluapshapvu vy il ylclyzlk if uhsvevul.</w><w><zayvun>Klwluklujl, hkkpjapvu, huk dpaokyhdhs</zayvun></w><w>Svun alyt bzl vm vwpvpkz pu uvu-thspnuhua whpu (svunly aohu 3 tvuaoz) jhyyplz hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klwluklujl huk hkkpjapvu, lclu ha aolyhwlbapj kvzlz. Ha aol luk vm aylhatlua aol kvzhnl zovbsk il ahwlylk zsvdsf av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz; ahwlypun myvt h opno kvzl thf ahrl dllrz vy tvuaoz. Zll hszv <lt>Ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu</lt>.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Vwpvpkz (uhyjvapj huhsnlzpjz) jhbzl jvth, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, huk wpuwvpua wbwpsz. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Vwpvpkz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h> huk jvuzpkly aol zwljpmpj huapkval, uhsvevul ofkyvjosvypkl.</w>\u
